game.toast_not_whitelisted: You can only add players who put you onto their friendlist.
game.toast_error_user_has_active_game: This player already has an active game, To be able to participate, please finish or delete this game first.
game.hint_guest_unranked: Games with guests will not be ranked!
game.toast_tourney_requirements: All players must be registered to the tournament.
game.explainer_flag_description: To finish a round, click on the flags in the order of finishing.
game.explainer_unrated_description: Games only count to your stats if all players have an account.
game.put_points_explanation: Set the points (without points from tichus) for {{name1}} and {{name2}}.
game.friendrequest_sent_message: {{name}} will see your request once the app is opened or under the profile tab. Add the person to your game once the request was accepted.
game.intro_2_text: To start a game, add a player in each open slot. If your friends don't have an account yet, you can add them as guests. However, games with guests will not count to your stats.
game.intro_3_text: During the game, you can put tichu announcements and bombs here. Once someone finishes, click on the flag for this player. When the flag for the 3rd player is set, the game is finished and you will be able to set the game points.
game.summary_no_round_played: Play the first round to see the summary here.

login.accept_terms: With the registration you accept the
login.reset_sent: We sent you a login-link to your email.
login.user_not_found: No user with this email found
login.register_error_password_length: Password must be at least 6 characters
login.auto_login_failed: Failed to log you in. Please request a new login link.
login.register_hint_email: Your email will only be used to send you a login-link in case you are logged out.
login.auto_login_explanation: Opening the login-link on your phone will automatically log you in.

profile.name: Name
profile.toast_userAlreadyOnWhiteListError: Player is already on your list
profile.recommend_message: Tichu Stats lets you track your games and gives you stats on how you and your friends play. The app is free, without any ads, and you play as usual with real cards or online. Are you good enough to beat my stats? Download it here:
profile.invalid_name: A user with the name already exists
profile.set_email: Click here to set your email

statistics.explainer_tichuAnnouncedWhen1stRate: Called Tichu when finishing first place
statistics.explainer_tichuMaster: Points out of Tichus per round
statistics.explainer_elo: Rating according to the ELO system
statistics.unranked_hint: {{rounds}} rated rounds until you see your ranking!

welcome.delete_alert_message: You can send a request to delete a game.
welcome.winningStreak_description: Win X games in a row
welcome.playXGamesInOneMonth_description: Play X games in one month
welcome.tournament_achievement_description: You are an outstanding Tichu Player
welcome.no_games_message_title: Track your first game to see your stats.
welcome.no_games_message_text: Note that games with guests won't count to your stats and will not visible here.

general.offline_content: Please verify your connection and try again.
general.friendrequest_received_message: Do you want to add {{name}} to your friendlist?
